comment.author: 43247421@N07
comment._content:
Tasmanian photographer Samuel Clifford's blind stamp impress on front below image: 
"S. Clifford Hobart Town Tasmania", printed as a double image panorama taken ca. 1868. Samuel Clifford (1827-1890).

comment.author: 99479038@N00
comment._content: On the left is Holy Trinity Church, just right of centre is Murray Street, just see St David's at the end of Murray, then Harrington Street, and on the right is St Mary's Cathedral
